Hi Stephen,

I have a producer-consumer pattern application. Originally I used multiple threading technology. Now I want to try C# 5 of TPL.

In the producer part, I created a blockingcollection and used a for   
loop to add items. Now I am working on consumer part. However I am not   
quite to understand the overwhelmed information of TPL. Which block type should  
 I select in the consumer part?

Buffering block or Execution block? Also I have the scheduler   
requirement, which is each time we can only consume up to maximum N   
items.

Thanks.
